item.title: Moose "has" a Problem
item.description: For Perl developers, I explain some of the problems with Moo's "has" function.

item.title: Will It Rain Tomorrow?
item.description: If every hour has a 10% change of rain, what are the odds it will rain tomorrow?

item.title: Babylonian Numbers for 8-Year Olds
item.description: Wherein I explaine Babylonian numbers to my eight year old daughter and now explain them to you.

item.title: Why is zero factorial equal to one?
item.description: A quick explanation of why the factorial of zero is one, not zero.

item.title: Missing Siblings?
item.description: Apparently I may have one of two siblings raised in the former Soviet Union.

item.title: A Eulogy for My Father
item.description: My father passed away recently. His life was a whirlwind of travel from country to country under mysterious circumstances.
